name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

<Target Action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: target, front, 20
  wait for movement
end

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
mp +10%: user
death break
wait: 8
</Target Action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

name: Double Poke
note:
<Timed Attack: circle>
<End Timed Attack>

<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>

<Target Action>
immortal: targets, true
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  camera focus: target
  zoom: 150%,20
  move user: target, front, 20
  wait for movement
end

timed attack

if $gameTemp.tas_power >= 1
force critical
end

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8

normal critical

if $gameTemp.tas_power > 0

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8

end

immortal: targets, false
</Target Action>

name: Fire, Ice, and Lightning
note:
<Timed Attack: circle>
<End Timed Attack>

<Use Timed Attack Action Sequences>

<Target Action>
immortal: targets, true

timed attack

if $gameTemp.tas_power >=1
force critical
end

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
action animation
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8

normal critical

if $gameTemp.tas_power > 0
timed attack
eval: this._addtionTest = true
else
eval: this._addtionTest = false
end

if $gameTemp.tas_power >= 1
force critical
end

if this._addtionTest == true

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
animation 0071: target
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8
end

normal critical

if $gameTemp.tas_power > 0

motion swing: user
perform action
motion wait: user
animation 0076: target
wait for animation
action effect
death break
wait: 8

end

immortal: targets, false
</Target Action>
